en: Make a joyful noise unto God, all the earth:
hmr: Leihnuoi po pohai, Pathien chawimawiin hlimtakin khêk unla,

en: Sing forth the glory of his name: Make his praise glorious.
hmr: A hming ropuizie chu hlain sak suok ro: Ama inpâkna chu sukropui ro.

en: Say unto God, How terrible are thy works! Through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee.
hmr: Pathien kuomah, “I thilthawhai chu a va ropui de! I thilthawtheina nasatzie leiin nangma dotuhai chu i kuomah intuklût an tih.

en: All the earth shall worship thee, And shall sing unto thee; They shall sing to thy name. [Selah
hmr: Leihnuoi po pohai hin chibai bûk an ti che a, Nangma inpâkin hla sak an ta, I hming inpâkin hla sak an tih,” ti ro.

en: Come, and see the works of God; He is terrible in his doing toward the children of men.
hmr: Hung ta u, Pathien thilthawhai hi en ta u, Mihriem nauhai chunga a thilthawa hin ṭi a um a nih.

en: He turned the sea into dry land; They went through the river on foot: There did we rejoice in him.
hmr: Ama chun tuisuoriet kha hnuoi ṭâwlah ân changtir a, Vadungpui kha kein an fe kâi a; Chutaka chun amaah ei hlim a.

en: He ruleth by his might for ever; His eyes observe the nations: Let not the rebellious exalt themselves. [Selah
hmr: A thilthawtheina chun kumkhuoin ro a rêl a, A mitin hnam tin a en hlak: Hel hmanghai chu anni le anni inchawimawi naw raw hai se.

en: Oh bless our God, ye peoples, And make the voice of his praise to be heard;
hmr: Aw mi tinhai, ei Pathien chu inpâk unla, Ama inpâkna ri chu inhriettir ro:

en: Who holdeth our soul in life, And suffereth not our feet to be moved.
hmr: Ama chun ei hringna hi a sukhring zing a, Ei kehai hi suktâwl a phal nawh.

en: For thou, O God, hast proved us: Thou hast tried us, as silver is tried.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nangin i mi fieh a, Tangkaruo fieha a um angin, keini i mi fieh a.

en: Thou broughtest us into the net; Thou layedst a sore burden upon our loins.
hmr: Nangin lênah i mi ṭhuoi lût a, Kan kâwnga hin phur riktak chu în nghat a.

en: Thou didst cause men to ride over our heads; We went through fire and through water; But thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.
hmr: Mihai tawlailîr chunga chuongin, kan lu chungah în fetir a, Mei le tui kan fe thleng a, Nisienlakhawm, hmun chênghnâwngtaka lût dingin i mi ṭhuoi suok a;

en: I will come into thy house with burnt-offerings; I will pay thee my vows,
hmr: Pumrawhmanga thil inhlânhai leh i inah lût ka ta, Ka thutiemhai chu i kuomah hlen ka tih.

en: Which my lips uttered, And my mouth spake, when I was in distress.
hmr: Ka hmûrin a hril a, Lunginzînga ka um laia ka bauin a hrilhai chu.

en: I will offer unto thee burnt-offerings of fatlings, With the incense of rams; I will offer bullocks with goats. [Selah
hmr: Sa thâutak pumrawhmanga thil inhlânhai i kuomah inhlân ka ta, Berâmchalhai raw rim inhnik leh; Bâwngchalhai, kêlhai leh inhlân ka tih.

en: Come, and hear, all ye that fear God, And I will declare what he hath done for my soul.
hmr: Hung ta u, Pathien ṭituhai po po, ngai ta u, Chuongchun, ka hringna dinga a thilthaw chu inhriettir ka ti cheu.

en: I cried unto him with my mouth, And he was extolled with my tongue.
hmr: Ama chu ka bauin ka ko a, Ka leia chawimawiin a um a.

en: If I regard iniquity in my heart, The Lord will not hear:
hmr: Ka lungrila suolna ka ngaisak chun, LALPA chun mi ngaisak naw nih.

en: But verily God hath heard; He hath attended to the voice of my prayer.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, Pathien chun a mi lo ngai a, Ka ṭawngṭâina ri chu a lo bengkhawn a nih.

en: Blessed be God, Who hath not turned away my prayer, Nor his lovingkindness from me.
hmr: Pathien, ka ṭawngṭâina inhlawsamtir loa, ka kuoma a ngilneina ma ngailotu chu, Inpâkin um raw se.
